title: BetterOMS Trade Plan
description: Trade plan schema for BetterOMS vv0.0.5 - single-user order management system for Polymarket

planId.description: Unique identifier for this trade plan execution (used for idempotency)

mode.description: Execution mode: 'paper' for simulation, 'live' for real trading

marketTokenId.description: Polymarket token ID (ERC1155 token ID for the specific market outcome). This is the long numeric ID used by the CLOB API, not the market ID or slug.

outcome.description: Outcome to trade: YES or NO

side.description: Order side: BUY to acquire position, SELL to reduce position

orderType.description: Order type: MARKET for immediate execution, LIMIT for specified price

size.description: Order size in USDC collateral (e.g., 100 = $100 worth)

price.description: Limit price (required for LIMIT orders, ignored for MARKET orders)

trades.description: List of trades to execute in this plan
